title: 4800 champ but witch one should I get?
body: Hi guys i am tossing up whether i should buy Rumble or Lee sin With my 4800 IP if u have any more suggestions for 4800 or just say what one you think i should get!

replies.body:
Are you looking to fill a particular role (top/jungle), or just want a "fun" champ.

Champs I like at 4800 - Xerath, Volibear, Renekton, Nocturne, Lee Sin, Ahri and Irelia. Not saying they are the strongest, I just find them fun.
Ok i will think about that
rumble :) one of the strongest top laners atm, lee however is not as strong jungle as he used to be, better choices for that are WW, panth and nunu
Thanks ! for the Idea but i wont decide until i see more comments.But well done on being the first!
